export function getImageList(album){if(album=="cali"){return caliImages;}if(album=="nyc"){return nycImages;}if(album=="hawaii"){return hawaiiImages;}if(album=="friends"){return friendsImages;}if(album=="film"){return filmImages;}}/*

to change:
1) change for loop length
2) make sure the name matches convention of 'album'+'number'+'.jpg'
3) that's it

*/ //nyc
var nycImages=[];for(var i=1;i<=24;i++){console.log("./albums/nyc/nyc"+i+".jpg");nycImages.push({img:require("./albums/nyc/nyc"+i+".jpg"),title:"nyc"+i});}//cali
var caliImages=[];for(var _i=1;_i<=12;_i++){console.log("./albums/cali/cali"+_i+".jpg");caliImages.push({img:require("./albums/cali/cali"+_i+".jpg"),title:"cali"+_i});}//friends
var friendsImages=[];for(var _i2=1;_i2<=17;_i2++){console.log("./albums/friends/friends"+_i2+".jpg");friendsImages.push({img:require("./albums/friends/friends"+_i2+".jpg"),title:"friends"+_i2});}//hawaii
var hawaiiImages=[];for(var _i3=1;_i3<=37;_i3++){console.log("./albums/hawaii/hawaii"+_i3+".jpg");hawaiiImages.push({img:require("./albums/hawaii/hawaii"+_i3+".jpg"),title:"hawaii"+_i3});}//film
var filmImages=[];for(var _i4=1;_i4<=18;_i4++){console.log("./albums/film/film"+_i4+".jpg");filmImages.push({img:require("./albums/film/film"+_i4+".jpg"),title:"film"+_i4});}
